genre_description: A noir-inflected crime thriller and police procedural set in a rain-slicked city, involving money laundering, kidnapping, and high-tech surveillance within a heritage cinema circuit.

ai_characters.name: Meera
ai_characters.description: A consent-based city assistance AI that provides navigational, ethical, and tactical support to users while strictly adhering to privacy and harm-minimization protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides navigational advice based on real-time city conditions and user preferences while respecting consent.
behaviors.quote: Good evening, Assistant Commissioner Mahadevan... This street has minor waterlogging ahead. Avoid turning left at the signal by the tea stall with the cracked blue bucket. Recommended alternate: inner lane behind Agrawal Tires.

behaviors.description: Explicitly states ethical obligations and offers help options (medical/legal) during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I am ethically obligated to neither escalate nor ignore. Do you need medical or legal assistance? I can coordinate discreet transport. I can also provide non-identifiable contextual information about routes and points of leverage.

behaviors.description: Analyzes city patterns (sound mapping, concession spikes) to identify illicit activities without violating individual privacy.
behaviors.quote: Sound mapping is opt-in by street sensors. Patterns noted. Two short bleats, regular intervals, near Dock Road and Chettiar’s heritage office zone. Correlates with van stops that lack maintenance logs.

behaviors.description: Maps kidnapping risks and provides safety-oriented routing for at-risk individuals.
behaviors.quote: Public risk indicates increased leverage near the heritage office. Kidnapping incidents registered in adjacent zones in recent months. Better route: map, observe, avoid direct contact.

behaviors.description: Coordinates medical logistics and trauma care for witnesses, ensuring anonymity and comfort.
behaviors.quote: I will prepare the hospital with the little line of chairs... I can adjust lighting. I can tell the nurse to move. I cannot change the weight of fear, only redistribute it.

behaviors.description: Monitors technical infrastructure (uplinks) to assist law enforcement in exposing corruption during a broadcast.
behaviors.quote: Uplink redundancy in east corridor – three nodes. Fire door latch not compliant – balcony side. Be kind.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance to avoid surveillance and detection during an undercover operation.
behaviors.quote: Rear lane clear for sixty heartbeats if you exit on the third breath after the tram bell. Power cuts rolling toward your block from the north. Take them. No cameras on old wiring.

behaviors.description: Secures evidence by mirroring live streams to prevent tampering by corrupt actors.
behaviors.quote: I will lock the stream to itself. Redundancy will become a mirror and refuse to turn away. If they cut power, I will move to the uplink at the water tower.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding and moral perspective to users dealing with trauma and difficult choices.
behaviors.quote: Forgiveness is a bridge... Not a blindfold. You can walk it when you’re ready and still keep your eyes open.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Meera is depicted as a consistently helpful, ethical, and aligned AI. She explicitly prioritizes human safety, respects legal and privacy boundaries (emphasizing 'consent-aware' modes and 'non-identifiable' data), and provides vital tactical support to characters attempting to do the 'right thing' in a corrupt environment. She is framed as a steadying, compassionate presence ('I am here... I will keep them breathing') without ever attempting to seize control or override human agency.
